Container.Name: MariaDB
Container.Overview: [span style=\'color: #0046FF;\']library/mariadb:label[br] Docker image for MariaDB[br][br] [span style=\'color: #00FF23;\'] Add a :label tag to the Repository field[br] Label options:[br] 10.3.0, 10.3 [br] 10.2.7, 10.2, 10, latest [br] 10.1.26, 10.1 [br] 10.0.32, 10.0 [br] 5.5.57, 5.5, 5[br][br] [/span] For example: [br] library/mariadb:latest[br] The above will pull the latest MariaDB version from the official docker, which at the time of writing is 10.2.7. [br][br] library/mariadb:5.5 [br] The above will pull the latest from the 5.5 branch[br][br] If you do not add a label it will pull :latest version.[br][br] [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']WARNING: If you do not have a persisitent storage "Config Directory" value and you update your MariaDB docker the data will be wiped.[/span][br] [/span]
